MajorClaims.MC1: both public services and arts worth investment
MajorClaims.MC2: both arts and public services are important to the community and should be invested properly

Claims.C1: indispensable public services like hospital and school worth every penny investing
Claims.C2: our standard of living also depend on another factor - spiritual life which is related closely with arts

Premises.P1: Investing in hospitals helps improve people's health, also, in schools assists with raising our children's education level
Premises.P2: if these facilities were not spent adequately, our standard of living would deteriorate
Premises.P3: Arts include many forms and music as well as cinema are the most typical
Premises.P4: These two art forms not only provide the public with entertainment but also contribute significantly to the economy
Premises.P5: The income of film and music industries produce millions of dollars each year for the Goverment, for instance K-pop and Hollywood, and these industries can not survive without goverment's financial assistance
